content: तनु {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (नु, न्वी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [तन्-उन्] {@--1@} Thin, lean, emaciated {@--2@} Delicate, slender, slim (as a limbs, as a mark of beauty); <ls>R. 6. 32</ls>; <ab>cf.</ab> तन्वंगी. {@--3@} Fine, delicate (as cloth); <ls>Rs. 1. 7.</ls> {@--4@} Small, little, tiny, scanty, few, limited; तनुवाग्विभवोऽपि सन् <ls>R. 1. 9</ls>, <ls n="R.">3. 2</ls>; तनुत्यागो बहुग्रहः <ls>H. 2. 91</ls> ‘giving little’ &c. {@--5@} Trifling, unimportant, little; <ls>Amaru. 27.</ls> {@--6@} Shallow (as a river). {%--<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} The body, the person. {@--2@} Outward form, manifestation: प्रत्यक्षभिः प्रपन्नस्तनुभिरवतु वस्ताभिरष्टाभिरीशः <ls>Ś. 1. 1</ls>; <ls>M. 1. 1.</ls> {@--3@} Nature, the form or character of anything. {@--4@} Skin. [<ab>cf.</ab> <ab>L.</ab> {%tenuis%}, <ab>Eng.</ab> {%thin%}.].
तन्वी A delicate or slender woman; इयमधिकमनोज्ञा वल्कलेनापि तन्वी <ls>Ś. 1. 20</ls>; तव तन्वि कुचावेतौ नियतं चक्रवर्तिनौ <ls>Udb.</ls>
